title: CEO & Founder
notes: Former Binance CFO (2018-2021). Acquired Coins.ph from Gojek in 2022. Leading crypto exchange in Philippines with 18M+ users. Expanding globally with Coins.xyz. Speaker at Consensus, Money20/20. Focus on remittance and financial inclusion through crypto.

title: CEO & Founder
notes: IMPORTANT: Same CEO as Coins.ph (Wei Zhou). Coins.xyz is the global expansion of Coins.ph. Founded by former Binance CFO Wei Zhou and led by ex-Binance executives. Recently launched in Brazil (Jan 2025). Global licensed exchange. Focus on real-world disbursements, contractor payments, supplier settlements.

title: Founder & CEO
notes: CFA charterholder. University of Pennsylvania - The Wharton School. Founded PDAX in 2018. Philippines' largest homegrown cryptocurrency exchange. Strong regulatory standing with BSP license. $51.1M raised in funding. Based in Quezon City, NCR.

title: Co-Founder & CSO (former) / Head of GCrypto at GCash
notes: Filipino crypto author, artist, and entrepreneur. Co-founded BloomX in 2015 (formerly Bloom Solutions). Former Philippine Country Manager of Yield Guild Games. Currently Head of GCrypto at GCash (Mynt - Globe Fintech Innovations). President of Blockchain Council of the Philippines. Pioneer in PH crypto since 2014. Author and illustrator.

title: Co-Founder & Chief Community Officer
notes: In Bitcoin since early 2013. Co-founded SCI (Satoshi Citadel Industries) in 2014. SCI is a pioneer Bitcoin and blockchain company in Philippines. Rebit.ph is a Bitcoin remittance service under SCI Ventures. Also co-founded Bitbit (founded 2014 with Jardine Gerodias and John Bailon). Long-standing player in PH crypto ecosystem.

title: Country Manager
notes: Country Manager for Binance Philippines. Major exchange with strong PH presence. Note: Need to verify current status as Binance has faced regulatory challenges in Philippines. May need updated contact information.
